::Prowl::

Prowl nods sadly. "One. Beachbomber."

He turns to Lunarpine. "The Alliance is a group of 'neutral' bots, led by 
Zardus. They ally themselves with whoever they please. In this battle, they 
helped up. In the last one, they nearly killed us."

He then grins. "We're in better condition than the Ark 'cause we can dodge. 
Something the Ark can't do. My name's Prowl, what's yours?"
